page.description: Specify the Id of the DIV in which the Detail View will be shown. You can use the {Grid.componentname} placeholder in the ID to ensure that the ID is unique when multiple Grids are running on the same page.
page.important: Do not put the target DIV in one of the freeform sections that surrounds the Grid part! Instead, turn on the Master Template, and define a custom template with the target DIV in the master template.
